full_description:
WiWU Snap Cube 10000mAh Magnetic Wireless Power Bank

The WiWU Snap Cube 10000mAh Magnetic Wireless Power Bank is a creative and practical device that can charge your phone and other devices wirelessly or through cable. This power bank has a magnetic charging mechanism that allows you to effortlessly and securely attach it to your phone or other devices. The power bank also incorporates a 45-degree stand that can be used to prop up your phone when viewing videos or making video calls. The power bank has an LED indicator light that displays the charging status as well as the remaining power. The WiWU Snap Cube 10000mAh Magnetic Wireless Power Bank has a 10000mAh capacity and can supply up to 20W PD Type C input and 22.5W USB A or 20W Type C output. With a maximum output of 15 watts, the power bank also allows wireless charging. With a total rated capacity of 37wh/3.7V, the power bank can charge numerous devices at the same time. Fast charging is also supported by the power bank, which helps cut charging time and enhance efficiency. The power bank works with iOS and Android devices that allow wireless charging or have a USB Type C connection. The power bank is comprised of high-quality, long-lasting components. The WiWU Snap Cube 10000mAh Magnetic Wireless Power Bank is small and light, weighing 350 grams and measuring 13 x 7 x 4.1 millimeters.
